document.full_text: an accountant who tipped off the irs that his employer was skimping on taxes has received $4.5 million in the first irs whistleblower award.
document.title: irs awards $4.5m to whistleblower
lines_and_colors: an accountant who tipped off the irs that his employer was skimping on taxes has received $4.5 million in the first irs whistleblower award.
